title: Python Interpreter

openaiSpec.name: execute_python

code.description:
A valid Python code snippet to be executed in the Pyodide Python WASM runtime. Best practices:
- Prefer single-line or concise multi-line code
- Use simple, direct print statements
- Avoid complex formatting or multiple descriptive prints
- Prefer direct value printing
- For multi-line code, use triple quotes to preserve newline characters

Example of recommended usage:
```
import numpy as np
print(np.array([1, 2, 3]))
```

Note: First executions in a session may require a brief warmup.

packages.description: A list of Python packages to load before executing the code. Only include packages that are necessary for the specific calculation.

openaiSpec.description:
Execute a Python code snippet in a secure browser-based Python runtime (Pyodide). Limitations:
- Supports up to 6-7 print statements per execution
- First execution may have a warmup delay
- Prefers simple, direct code snippets

Provide the list of packages needed in the `packages` parameter. Recommended to use simple print statements and avoid complex output formatting.

overviewMarkdown: Allows the AI assistant to run Python snippets in your browser using Pyodide's python WASM runtime.
